data.eml:eml: A new species of Buthus Leach, 1815 from Cyprus (Scorpiones, Buthidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yagmur, Ersen Aydin, Koc, Halil, Lourenco, Wilson R. (2011): A new species of Buthus Leach, 1815 from Cyprus (Scorpiones, Buthidae). ZooKeys 115: 27-38, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.115.1135, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.115.1135
